**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 539

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your party may now attempt one [Civic](/Traits.aspx?ID=436) activity for each of the kingdom's settlements. You determine the order in which these activities are attempted and who rolls any skill checks.
</column>
